nio/GoogleMapsGeocode.description: This block receives an incoming signal and will send a request to the Google Maps API in order to geocode the configured address/location.  Geocoding is the process of converting addresses (like a street address) into geographic coordinates (like latitude and longitude), which you can use to place markers on a map, or position the map.

address.title: Street Address
address.description: Street address to be converted into geographic coordinates

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API Key for the Google Maps API

default.description: The input list of signals plus latitude and longitude for the configured address
